about_the_game:
Five people you barely know have been locked inside a café - and it’s all your fault.

Your first day working at The Familiar - a cosy café in downtown Artifice County - was going quite well. The customers were strange and your boss was a literal cat, but for a minimum wage job, it wasn’t all that bad.

Sadly, you never intended on sticking around.

Not when there was a secret recipe to steal.



The people trapped inside with you are excellent scapegoats to pin your crime on. Gather evidence and build an air-tight case against your chosen culprit - without drawing suspicion and ending up in hot water yourself.



Navigate conversations between a diverse cast of characters to figure out what they know about each other - and how you can use that to your advantage.



Throughout your interrogation, influence the characters’ thoughts and feelings. Call out a bad habit, indulge a flair for the dramatic or play into their façades. Who will you get to spill the beans on their deepest, darkest secrets? Will you befriend, betray, or both? You might even end up finding out more than you bargained for…



Their feelings will influence how they react to your final accusation, but also dictate how they feel about the other characters. Will you leave them better than you found them - or leave a bitter taste in their mouth?



After you’ve gathered your evidence and made your impression on the characters, it’s time to make your accusation. Choose from a total of 15 possible accusation paths and try to convince everyone whodunnit.



Spill The Beans is ripe with replayability - blame, shame and frame to your heart’s content, or maybe even find another way to close the case…

When you’re the one whodunnit, who will you get to spill the beans?

Features:
  • Investigate, interrogate, manipulate: a colourful cast of characters including a vampire, a skeleton and a cat - help them overcome their flaws and leave the café a better person, or enable their worst habits to bring about their own downfall
  • Choose your accused: a replayable story that responds to your choices, with over 15 possible ways to complete the game
  • Finest house blend: contains 20+ custom CGs and over 100 sprite variations to show the characters at their best and worst, plus an original soundtrack refined to bring out the essence of each and every character
  • Be yourself, do crimes: customise your pronouns and let the characters get to know the real you
  • Coffee connoisseur: collect achievements and unlock secret recipes for some fantastical drinks!
